_header: Christs blood the high of life three things it hath undone
_description: On the three virtues of Christ’s blood, in John Grimestone’s sermon notes — two couplets

NLS18721.Transcription:
Cristis blod þe heyȝe of lif þre þinggis it hat
                    vndonHeuene & helle & mannis soule þat michil hat
                    misdonIche man oliue þat wile rith wel donÞenk of þo
                    wondes fiue þat he ne be nout fordon
NLS18721.Note: Written down right side of page, top to bottom.
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 40.
